title: Connection error, to league...  help page is down
body:
Connection error, to league...  got kicked from game and keeps stopping me on login screen.  its lame that i lost a perfectly good games, lost lp and ruined my teammates experience cause of this bullshit... 
only people that should be suffering this much is the enemy team cause im dominating them...


First game ina while where i get people that are not flaming each other, where im 5/1 and this is what happens

plz its been like two hours now

replies.body:
Are you still having issues logging in? If so, I recommend working through the steps on our [Login Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues), since it goes over the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if your issue persists.

Same here. I had problems with my first 2 games today, 3rd actually connected at a decent time. Let's see about the 4th now... 

I know this is a free game, but this is a sad accident to have happen during the week of such a momentous occasion.

Actually, I just realized the game completely quit out after this third round. No stats screen or anything.

EDIT: Seems as though all is well on my end now

Only things that i can think of to help is that I'm Texas Based. ( best state ever )
I was playing Ekko.
Connection is good to anyother web site of game.
my friend, that was my duo partner at the time, did not disconnect nor did my alleys or enemy.  
my game did stutter for a bit before disconnecting but i think that was lag cause i had no fps issues. i have a strong rig that never has problems at high settings.

I killed the enemy eve as i was disconnecting without using summs, flash, or ult. in a 1v2 against their mid... :<
